column6: "TEAM PLAYER" Moon Knight embarks on his first adventure with Steve Rogers' new Super-team: The Secret Avengers!   Captain Barracuda and his crew of pirates that have hijacked a tanker transporting two million barrels of  crude that's worth north of two-hundred mil on the open market and executed 9 hostages just to show they're not playing around.  But neither are Steve Rogers, War Machine, Valkyrie, Ant-Man and their newest recruit, Moon Knight. They're ready to rumble...and if that means taking on Barracuda's reinforcements - a legion of creatures from the bowels of the deep blue sea - so be it. Parental Advisory ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Gregg Hurwitz | artist:Francesco Mattina | penciller:Juan Jose Ryp
